page.title: 14SHOPPING.
page.content: The area is very isolated and has {no shop of its own.}People cannot easily get into towns because of the lack of regular public transport and the time and distance involved.Most people travel 14 miles into{Hereford } 3-4 times a month for a "big shop". The area is served by{2 mobile {shops}owned by different people. Between them they cover the whole area at least twice a week.From them you can get a whole range of foodstuffs from sweets to fruit and vegetables. You order each visit for delivery the following week. There is also a{travelling Library which comes monthly visiting Craswall on a Thursday and Michaelchurch on a Monday.This van has different shelves for each age group.It is very well used.You can order a book for you to collect on the next visit.
